lock().description: Lock the Bin to the currently stored item type. The Bin must not be creative, empty, or already locked
lock().name: lock

getLock().description: Get the type of item the Bin is locked to (or Air if not locked)
getLock().name: getLock

getCapacity().description: Get the maximum number of items the bin can contain.
getCapacity().name: getCapacity

isLocked().description: If true, the Bin is locked to a particular item type.
isLocked().name: isLocked

getStored().description: Get the contents of the bin.
getStored().name: getStored

unlock().description: Unlock the Bin's fixed item type. The Bin must not be creative, or already unlocked
unlock().name: unlock
